website_summaries.verdict: A complete set that comes at bargain price. A great buy if you don't mind the short cup handles.
pros: Similar in construction and set size to other models at a lower price
cons: The cup handles are somewhat short

customer_reviews.title: inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Spoons seem well made but they are not accurate at all for measuring volume. The US and metric units stamped on each spoon are not equivelent. The tablespoon says 20 mL, but a tablespoon is supposed to be roughly 15 mL. I measured with my kitchen scale and sadly metric stamp is correct. This means you're going to get an additional 33% with each scoop from the spoon. Other units of measure were off, too, but the tablespoon was the most egregious. They seem like nice spoons and cups, but they aren't worth much if they don't measure correctly.
customer_reviews.author: garrett olson

customer_reviews.title: Bent and started to rust.
customer_reviews.text: They seamed really nice at first, but after trying to scoop out some brown sugar the handle bent on one. Additionally, at the rivet points where the handle attaches to the cup they have started to rust after just a month of use. Updated to 1 star after 2 months of use. 2 of the measuring cups have broken at the handle and 1 is rusting at the solder joint. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Meg SD

customer_reviews.title: My Mom can’t clean these measurements off
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my mother. She’s that mom that will hold on to something broken and almost unable to use because she “can’t find anything better”. She wanted measuring cups and spoons with the measurements etched into them so they wouldn’t wash off. I’m not sure what kind of funky abrasive soap my mom uses to rub of measurements on all her utensils but it happens. Could be her super power forces of cleaning, but regardless I don’t think in her years left she will be able to rub these measurements off. Quality sturdy product. And if you have a mother with super cleaning powers these will make her happy, buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley T.

customer_reviews.title: They do what they're supposed to, but aren't amazing.
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars is average, not a BAD review. These look nice (ish) and do what I intended them to do. Only been washed a few times and I see some wear. These are not heavy duty, nor are they super accurate. There are also some less than ideal rough edges. But if you''re just going to flour something or scoop rice and dried spices, they work great. If you need scientific precision or perfect finish, spend more. For simple to clean set of basic measures, they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Good value...with caveat
customer_reviews.text: Just got these. They seem sturdy enough. Other reviews say measurements may be inaccurate. I have no info for that. Just noting that my initial view is that these are sturdy. I like the 1/8 tsp spoon and 1/8 cup measures, which are hard to find sometimes. I'll see how they do after washing. I'll compare measurements with others I have in my kitchen. Major drawback so far, however, is the measurements imprinted on the handle are hard to read. This is fairly common, however, on metalware. Otherwise, this is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy in Madison

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and works but not high quality.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and it looks like they are accurate. You get what you pay for though. Edges are rough. The product seems to just be stamped out, not polish or rounding of corners. Can't complain for the price though.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: I have had these for 3 years and still love them
customer_reviews.text: The most important thing I think is that they have NOT rusted! That's a huge accomplishment alone and would recommend to anyone looking for easy to clean, rust-proof measuring spoons. Since I bought these 3 years ago, I have also moved states and lived in a bunch of different apartments and they have lasted through it all. If you're reading this, just buy them.. you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Don't use these to scoop your sugar or flour with because they will bend easily. Scoop the ingredients into the cup if you want them to very long. The ring the some on is cheap, thin and terrible for use. I was able to replace the ring on my measuring cups but not with the spoons. It is such a hassle to get them on and off the ring that I do not even use them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel is my favorite and all different sizes are great.
customer_reviews.text: This set was purchased as a gift for my granddaughter. The set looks exactly like what I wanted. I have a different set that does not include all the measurements that are in this set. I dont know about the sturdiness, but they look pretty sturdy to me, so I am quite satisfied. After she uses it and finds anything she doesnt like, I will let you know after Christmas. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Crary

customer_reviews.title: UK unit Measurement cups and spoons.
customer_reviews.text: The metal handles on them have extremely sharp corners and the metal for the handles are extremely thin. Other than that works as advertised. FYI - These are UK measurements. US measurements are a lot smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Bullwinkle

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product for a very nice price
customer_reviews.text: These came right on the date they were scheduled for, they arrived in a box with some other purchases I made and they were packaged in plastic resealable bag. There are a few rough edges but nothing that makes them difficult to use. For the price, since they didn't cost much, I'd say they're worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Pano Rama

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy the cup measures and that I can read what ...
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the cup measures and that I can read what they are. They are engraved or punched in and for me that makes a big difference. The measuring spoons are the same thing. I like that they have a 1 1/2 Tablespoon measure and they feel just right in my hand. I don't like that the measuring cups don't have a 3/4 cup measure but I can work with it. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Retired Desert Rat

customer_reviews.title: Improperly labeled 1/4 measuring cup
customer_reviews.text: These measuring cups should get five stars. They’re sleek looking, accurate measurements, and sturdy. However they lose two stars because my 1/4 cup size came labeled as a 1/3 cup size. I am returning them for a corrected product and if I receive one, I will update my review and give the remaining two stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie B

customer_reviews.title: customer service is just great!
customer_reviews.text: In less than two weeks of use, the 3/4 cup handle was detached from the cup body (pictured), the spoons are fine. update: Accmor customer service responded my feedback in less a day and provided me a replacement immediately, it really impressed me and I decided to try the new set and they are so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: hopestay

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: Bought this measuring set for my 6 year old, she loves it. Since it’s 100% stainless steel, it is light weight and very easy to use. The size labels are nice and clear on the handles. Most importantly, product is so easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin F.

customer_reviews.title: but for an average guy like me using them for general cooking
customer_reviews.text: They arrived on time and the packaging was top notch. Others have stated that the spoons are heave duty while the cups handles are a little flimsy, this is some what true, but for an average guy like me using them for general cooking, they are built well enough. Unless your measuring out gold or using these in a restaurant, there might be a problem with a handle detaching after a while. I purchased these because the plastic handle on my 1 cup Farberware broke while gently tapping rice out of it on the sink, so I figured stainless would be better.
customer_reviews.author: jabberwockie

customer_reviews.title: Great set, good price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have a solid metal measuring set that won't come apart in the first few uses. This is a solid set and I like the fact that it doesn't rust. The spoons are a great weight and I know they'll put up with the amount of use I'll put them through. I do a large amount of baking (make my own sandwich breads, dinner rolls, muffins, etc.) and plastics just don't hold up. I've already discarded a different set of metal cups that I bought as they started rusting within two months. I've had this set for just under three months now and I still love it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kurtz

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these specifically to have a sturdy set of minimalist measuring spoons with clear labels and a clean look. They have done this perfectly. The insides are textured and I don't know if that's good or bad, but I've had no trouble keeping them clean. I do recommend drying them right away, as with all steel items they might get water spots if they air dry.
customer_reviews.author: Essidus

customer_reviews.title: This is an AWESOME heavy duty commercial type set
customer_reviews.text: When I started looking I thought this would be a really cheap and would not last long. Boy was I I wrong! This is an AWESOME heavy duty commercial type set. It is exactly what I was looking for! I do a lot of commercial style cooking and this set is going to be doing some very heavy work in my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Earl Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I'm so tired of cheap plastic measuring cups whose lettering rubs off or that come unclipped and scatter all over the drawer. These babies are worth every penny because the numbers will never come off and the metal ring keeps them together.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Happy to find a complete set
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has two different forms of measurements on the handles in case recipes don't use that specific one. I like that the measurements are also etched rather than printed on as I had to buy these for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Tanner

customer_reviews.title: This is a good value.
customer_reviews.text: Good value. Built well. I have been using these now for a few weeks. They clean up well. No rust.
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: At the price point, I didn't expect much. I really just needed something for the holidays. I was pleasantly surprised to find that these are very high quality and I believe I will be able to get years of use out of them.
customer_reviews.author: shopanista

customer_reviews.title: Needs better cups
customer_reviews.text: The spoons are great but the cups are not smooth inside. You can see small rings or grooves from the center of the bottom all the way up the sides of the cups. Fortunately, the price was cheap and the spoons are good so it’s not a waste of money. I think I can repurpose the cups for something other than baking, like for laundry and cleaning supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia G.

customer_reviews.title: Well made, sturdy, good price
customer_reviews.text: Nice set, especially for the price. I was impressed. Have not tested the accuracy of the measurements. I guess I just assume it is correct. Sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Dean

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cups!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy measuring cups that are easy to clean and are accurate. No leaks at all (unless you overflow it). I plan to buy a second set just because.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great set with 1/8 cup and 1/8 teaspoon
customer_reviews.text: This just arrived today. It is just what I wanted with the 1/8 cup and 1/8 teaspoon. Seems to be pretty good quality stainless steel. I would recommend this to someone looking for a good set. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Standard measuring utensils that I actually have not used yet, but seem sturdy enough. They stack nicely and take up little room. I wanted to get rid of the plastic that I had been using. Update: Finally had the chance to use these a couple of times and unfortunately do not like them. The handle end have sharp corners and dig into the hands when holding, very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Springbear

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after being frustrated with my other plastic measuring cups that lost the measurements in writing and I'd be left guessing and hoping I was using the right size. I've had these for many months now and I know when I'm using 1 cup etc without guessing. They all look brand new and haven't had one spot of rust or fear of germs like plastic.
customer_reviews.author: nadia m.

customer_reviews.title: We use them regularly.
customer_reviews.text: Gal uses them for her baking needs and I mainly use them for supplementation precision. Great addition to the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set of stainless steel measuring cups and spoons and what a great price on them too. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: El

customer_reviews.title: Good teaspoons, cheap measuring cups
customer_reviews.text: Table/teaspoons appear to be good quality. However, multiple typos on the product page and description, along with thin tin-like measuring cups with raw edges (like something you'd find in a camping mess kit) made me compelled to return the product. The quality of the measuring cups was less than impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Torjer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: These were alot nicer than I was expecting to be honest. Really thick and durable, I can see these standing the test of time. The price was more than reasonable for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Partyof6

customer_reviews.title: Great Set of Measuring Cups and Spoons
customer_reviews.text: I love the stainless steel, they’re easy to clean, the spoons feel very sturdy and well-made, the cups are a thinner metal, though, so I feel in the long-run they might break.
customer_reviews.author: Langi

customer_reviews.title: METAL not plastic.
customer_reviews.text: I prefer metal utensils and these are just what I wanted. They can take the heat or cold and clean up easily. Of course they are dishwasher safe, too.
customer_reviews.author: PawpawAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice set of kitchen ware
customer_reviews.text: the measuring cups handles are a little sharp on the edges, so I bought some rubber dip at Home Depot and dip the handles a couple times and now they are good
customer_reviews.author: Jerold Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: Great set! It's got all the measurements you'll really need at a good price. It's sturdy and accurate. Be careful of the handle because it does dig into your hand if you press too much
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: 100% Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy is an understatement!! Wish I would of bought these years ago because they would of held up.
customer_reviews.author: Charley

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The cups and spoons are easily read and have a ‘sharp’ enough edge to make leveling the measure easy. Great quality for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Review
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Comfortable to hold in your hand, light weight, and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Bthrash

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate measurements
customer_reviews.text: I have an old measuring spoon set and compared the measurements with this set and they are not equivalent. These measuring spoons are much larger. I even weighed the measurements on my food scale and everything was off. If it weren't for the fact that I'm in NY in the midst of a pandemic, I would've returned these.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper123

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use & Clean
customer_reviews.text: I receive these as a gift and I am glad that they are steel versus plastic. They are a little thinner-sided than I prefer, but they do great in the dishwasher, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Lots of good quality spoons
customer_reviews.text: I really like the spoons and that the cups come with an 1/8 cup but the cup handles are a bit thin n sharp. Overall I'm happy with them overall.
customer_reviews.author: J. Landau

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this for a few weeks so I am not sure if it will never rust. BUT so far so good. They are sturdy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: MCB

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Idea
customer_reviews.text: I will not be personally using these I bought them for a raffle that I am doing for a charity event very happy with the quality/price.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen staple - Check
customer_reviews.text: I like the weight... not heavy but more substantial than some cheap aluminum cups I had. These look nice and seem to be accurate as far as measuring goes.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Snedeker

customer_reviews.title: Good quality except the cup measures seem a bit too ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality except the cup measures seem a bit too thin of metal to scoop out the flour/sugar. It feels like the metal would bend a bit and the tablespoon measures are labeled incorrectly on one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Lasabar

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and well made measuring spoons and cups
customer_reviews.text: These are a gift, so I haven't actually used them, but I can see that they are well made.
customer_reviews.author: Catsma

customer_reviews.title: Not thick Stainless Steel
customer_reviews.text: It’s not thick stainless steel as the one I have at home. I wanted to have two sets, but I don’t really like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. Not cheap or thin metal like a dollar store brand. Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Measurements
customer_reviews.text: Was really disappointed in the measurement sizes as they are not correct which makes them unusable. They were much larger than stated on the measurements. The tablespoon was almost double.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality.
customer_reviews.text: They look beautiful. I want to love them.... but the quality is awful. Breaking one after another with gentle use. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Above average quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of this product. It is above what you normally get in a super store. I ordered these because I wanted measuring spoons that don’t bend under a little pressure. I also like the measuring cups that include a 1/8 cup measurement. These are heavy and substantial. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Engraved measurements cannot wear away
customer_reviews.text: The measuring cups and spoons are used on a daily basis. It's nice not having to worry about the measurements washing off since they are engraved. The measuring spoons have the 1/8 t. that you rarely find in a store, also. They're easily removed from the ring that keeps them together, if you want less on the ring and for easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Useful & decorative
customer_reviews.text: Neat looking! Mine are handy in a chicken wire picture frame just above my prep area in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very durable. Can be hard to read if you have bad eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Rapp

customer_reviews.title: good price, good product
customer_reviews.text: they do what i need them to do. got tired of the plastic junk with the labeling all gone. could be heavier but i'm not complaining.
customer_reviews.author: Rolf Thorsson

customer_reviews.title: Good except the tablespoon
customer_reviews.text: Good quality although tablespoon measurement is 20ml, which American Standard is roughly 14ml and that might throw some stuff off.
customer_reviews.author: adam p nalow

customer_reviews.title: Great !!
customer_reviews.text: Great ! I’m keeping them !! And yes I’d buy them again!!
customer_reviews.author: donkey-boy

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen essential
customer_reviews.text: I prefer stainless steel measuring cups over the plastic ones. These seem very durable and like they will last a long time. I've had for a few weeks now and they have not rusted or anything like that. I say buy them.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Poor Qualty
customer_reviews.text: Contrary to the description of this set, the handles ARE spot welded on. The overall set is very lightweight and feel quite cheap. I returned them immediately upon opening the box.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wildey

customer_reviews.title: They work fine.
customer_reviews.text: They work fine, it's measuring cups, not much to say.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Lopez

customer_reviews.title: ... punched in (rounded handle connection) and we couldn't be happier!!
customer_reviews.text: The only ones I've found with attached handles (2 pieces put together) instead of the cups being punched in (rounded handle connection) and we couldn't be happier!!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Cain

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The product was as described and even more than expected. They are heavy duty, easy to read, and seems as though they will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: M. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. Bends easily.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and flimsy. The handle bends when you take a big scoop. Pay a little extra and buy something that doesn't feel like it came from the dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but size markings are wrong
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a solid set, but we got two different sized cups that moth have the 1/3rd cup engraving. The large one is the actual third of a cup and the smaller one is the quarter cup.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Nice measuring spoons
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved this gift! She is a professional baker.
customer_reviews.author: KAREN Toothe

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: The order arrived promptly and it's a nice set. I like that the measurements are engraved in the handle which will makes it less likely to tarnish or fade.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Renee Campbell

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. This is the 2nd set we ordered because the tablespoon mysteriously disappeared. We later found it, but no regrets. It's a great set. 4 star on sturdiness only because if scooping out heavier ingredients the handle can start to bend slightly. But by no means is this flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty set
customer_reviews.text: I gave this set to my daughter for Christmas for their new house. Very heavy duty and I'm sure it will last for years. I may end up purchasing another set for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Jan H.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived scuffed and scratched
customer_reviews.text: Arrived scuffed and scratched! Looks like I bought them at the second hand store! I like that they came in a multitude of measuring sizes as it is just what I needed but disappointed in the quality of the packaging. They certainly don’t look new... I might return them!
customer_reviews.author: TyneeTaps

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could say I bought these for myself, but I bought then as a gift for my daughter in law. She was so happy to have a good quality in her kitchen where they could be washed and not lose the markings for the sizes. Thank you! You won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: KarenB

customer_reviews.title: very nice set
customer_reviews.text: Nice Set, wish it were a little more rounded edges, but it does what it is supposed to. Would I recommend them, yes.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Oldham

customer_reviews.title: My only complain is the squared handles as they are uncomfortable in the hand and don't feel very sturdy. Aside from that
customer_reviews.text: The different size measuring cups are convenient and make measuring food a lot easier. They reasonably priced and the stainless steel look is attractive. My only complain is the squared handles as they are uncomfortable in the hand and don't feel very sturdy. Aside from that, they get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Would consider more items from this supplier.
customer_reviews.text: Handles could be a bit stronger on the cups. Spoons are great.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sommer

customer_reviews.title: good choice
customer_reviews.text: I’ve Typically purchased plastic cups and spoons and what I have found is the markings would rub off. so I decided to invest in a sturdier product with the measurements stamped into the handles.
customer_reviews.author: Tish Dion

customer_reviews.title: Great to measure and will really last!!!
customer_reviews.text: I Love these because they are Stainless Steel the text won't come off like it did on my old plastic ones. They quality is nice too not super thin or anything like that. Plus these seem easier to clean to me. I'm thinking about buying my mom a set I like them so much, she has the plastic ones now.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer

customer_reviews.title: great product. A bit annoying that they are all ...
customer_reviews.text: great product. A bit annoying that they are all tide together. Would be nice if they can detach somehow. Had to use 4 different scoops this morning
customer_reviews.author: Toronto Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Decent set of measures.
customer_reviews.text: Fairly decent measures. The cups are fairly light gauge stainless but the spoons are nice.
customer_reviews.author: Damgto1

customer_reviews.title: Great for baking or any recipes
customer_reviews.text: I use this for any recipes requiring measured ingredients. Does the job as intended.
customer_reviews.author: CLL

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These cups are sturdy, easy to clean and will last a lifetime! The measure for each cup is embossed into the Stainless Steel, so they'll never rub off. They won't get bent out of shape or cracked. They feel VERY professional, too! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: T.Gamino

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: It's what I wanted. I'm pleased with the product. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: mike kopec

customer_reviews.title: Durable measuring cups/spoons
customer_reviews.text: Pros: These items are sturdy with easy clean up. Cups stack nicely for storage Cons: Measuring cup set doesn't come with a 3/4 cup measuring cup. Measuring spoons don't have an easy clip to keep them together in your drawer. The one that comes with them is a like a key ring. Not the easiest to work with.
customer_reviews.author: kandlelady

customer_reviews.title: They are Australian measurements!
customer_reviews.text: Hmmm... well it would've been nice to have known they are AUSTRALIAN measurements! I live in the US!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Kusler

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Accuracy
customer_reviews.text: I opened them and they looked large. I pulled out my current half cup and tablespoon and sure enough these hold like 10% more of each.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: I feel ripped off
customer_reviews.text: The shipment did not include the measuring spoons. Which is why I ordered to begin with. Greatly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Cagle

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: didnt know how they would be. They are very nice sturdy heavier than i expected good quality would recommend for anybody looking for good siverware . I know they will last a long time very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: flowergirl

customer_reviews.title: Wife's happy, that's all that matters
customer_reviews.text: Nice, my wife loves to bake and the kids had lost most of her measuring cups. She loved these, simple, and at the right price.
customer_reviews.author: william b armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Super Shiny
customer_reviews.text: This was a great value for a great product! Super fast delivery, very nice product, love this. Will shop with you again!
customer_reviews.author: Katharine Morris

customer_reviews.title: These are great. I think I will really enjoy using them
customer_reviews.text: Have wanted stainless Measuring spoons and cups for a while. These are great. I think I will really enjoy using them!
customer_reviews.author: Just Plain Jane

customer_reviews.title: My first order
customer_reviews.text: Been stainless steel makes them durable and easy to clean. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: carmen lopez

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my sister for Christmas and she has enjoyed these immensely.
customer_reviews.author: sara akins

customer_reviews.title: Just be careful
customer_reviews.text: There were some metal shavings close to the handle of this product when I received it. And the small handles themselves are somewhat sharp and too small for my big hands. Just be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Flores

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this set. Very well made handles on the measuring cups.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Ordered from gift registry
customer_reviews.text: Product ordered from bridal registry and was used to complete a kitchen towel "cake" Please with product and would order for myself if needed
customer_reviews.author: Ellen B. Guffey

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Rust spots already after only a couple of uses, and the handles aren't completely welded. The 1/8 cup measure arrived not fully attached. I didn't mind that, but the rust spots so soon are the last straw.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Anne

customer_reviews.title: The handling and feeling of the product which was disappointing
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a very cheap piece of steel that can be easily bent even with the slight force even from a child. There are also several sharp edges and points that can lead to a safety incident, which is highly concerning.
customer_reviews.author: Humberto De La Garza

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this set today and am already impressed with the quality. They have a nice weight to them, and I love how they include 1/8th cup! Great addition to my kitchen,highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan M.

customer_reviews.title: Incorrectly marked measurements
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set of measuring spoons for my wife for Christmas. While the quality is nice, the Tbsp and 1/2 Tbsp are marked as 20ml and 10ml respectively. These are not the correct measurements, and this makes me question the accuracy of these measuring spoons and cups.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! The measurements were rubbing off on my cups and spoons so needed to order new ones. These are etched in the metal so I think they will last a long time! They are really great quality! Packaging was great and fast delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Mom in Frisco, TX

product_meta.title: Accmor 11 Piece Stainless Steel Measuring Spoons Cups Set, Premium Stackable Tablespoons Measuring Set for Gift Dry Liquid Ingredients Cooking Baking
feature_bullets: STAINLESS STEEL MEASURING SPOONS WITH ENGRAVED MARKING Accmor measuring spoons are made of highly satin brushed with best quality stainless steel with engraved marking written in both metric and metric size markings on the handles ensure measuring they are durable and attractive looking will never rub off long lasting and durable and used by professionals Perfect solution for cheap plastic spoons

DEEP ELONGATED SPOONS FOR EASY SCOOPING The spoons are designed with innovative round-shaped spoon heads fit most container opening rounded bowls are easy to fill with dry and liquid ingredient long comfort grip handles double as levelers

PERFECT SPOONS or CUPS FOR MEASURING Crafted of professional gauge tablespoons includes 11 measuring sizes 1/8 tsp 1/4 tsp 1/2 tsp 1 tsp 1/2 Tbsp 1Tbsp 1/8 cup 1/4 cup 1/3 cup 1/2 cup 1 cup. With each measurement conveniently marked on the handle of each spoon ensures the measuring

DURABLE AND EASY TO CLEAN AND STORAGE Measuring spoons are made of stainless steel which means our spoons will never rust and can be placed in the dishwasher safely after using They nest into each other beautifully making them very compact and easy to store away in the cutlery draw These spoons are conveniently connected by a small ring which helps to keep the spoons together as a set after a full day of baking or cooking

MUST-HAVE FOR KITCHEN UTILITARIAN GIFTS Perfect for house wife or cooking lover. It is a new elegant fun and more graceful way to measure anything when you cook or bake. There is difference between US & UK Tablespoon measures. For example 1 US Tablespoon is 15ml, but 1 UK Tablespoon is 20.
